item.title: Vengeance
item.dc:creator: @Dinovion Dinovion
item.description:
@Dinovion wrote:

You need to use.

[center]public void StrengthMagic(String s) { if(s.equalsIgnoreCase("RaiseStr")) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 96) if(RaiseStr == 0) { txt4 = "Taste vengeance!"; string4UpdateRequired = true; startAnimation(1979); playerLevel[2] += 25; Str3 = true; strPot = true; stillgfx(401, absX, absY); RaiseStr = 100; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 96) { sendMessage("You need 96 magic."); }[/center]

Read full topic

item.title: Vengeance
item.dc:creator: @strengthxlx strengthxlx
item.description:
@strengthxlx wrote:

public void StrengthMagic(String s) { if(s.equalsIgnoreCase("RaiseStr")) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 96) if(RaiseStr == 0) { txt4 = "Taste vengeance!"; string4UpdateRequired = true; startAnimation(1979); playerLevel[2] += 25; Str3 = true; strPot = true; stillgfx(401, absX, absY); RaiseStr = 100; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("Your vengeance hasn't worn off yet."); }

Anyone wanna help me to make it say you need 96 magic to cast this spell if they don’t have 96 magic and still say “your vengeance hasn’t worn off yet” if it hasn’t worn off?

Read full topic
